Trigger.Name: 探戈
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1[AE]:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) (?<type>gains|loses) the effect of 进攻之探戈 from

Trigger.Name: 扇舞·急
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of 扇舞·急预备 from

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: 标准舞步结束|技巧舞步结束

Trigger.Name: 坠喷泉
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of 坠喷泉预备 from

Trigger.Name: 逆瀑泻
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1[AE]:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) (?<type>gains|loses) the effect of 逆瀑泻预备 from

Trigger.Name: 升风车
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1[AE]:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) (?<type>gains|loses) the effect of (?:升风车预备) from

Trigger.Name: 落血雨
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1[AE]:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) (?<type>gains|loses) the effect of (?:落血雨预备) from

Trigger.Name: 结束
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1E:.{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) loses the effect of (标准舞步|技巧舞步) from
